|rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This module contains the [[Qualcomm Atheros#Mobile Computing]] WCN3660 :(dual-band single-stream 802.11n/BT 4.0 [BR/EDR+BLE]/FM Rx+Tx) RFIC, :designed to be paired with various ''[[Qualcomm]]'' MSM/APQ host processors. :.. which, per the [http://web.archive.org/web/20140714190958/https://www.bluetooth.org/tpg/RefNotes/SWB-QC30H_Datasheet%20Rev7_TTA.pdf '''Samsung''' SWB-QC30H module datasheet (via archive.org)] :and the press release below, includes, but may not be limited to, the following... *[[Qualcomm]] '''MSM''': 8260A, 8270, 8660A, 8930, 8960, 8974 *[[Qualcomm]] '''APQ''': APQ8030, APQ8060A, APQ8064, APQ8074 ==Links of Interest== *[https://chipworks.secure.force.com/catalog/ProductDetails?sku=QUA-WCN3660 ''WCN3660'' @ '''ChipWorks'''] *[http://www.qualcomm.com/media/releases/2011/05/31/qualcomm-atheros-announces-highly-integrated-connectivity-solution ''Qualcomm Atheros Announces Highly Integrated Connectivity
Solution for Superior Performance in Smartphones and Tablets''
- '''QCA''' press release regarding WCN3660] [[Category:English Documentation]]
